name: Emolga
author: Megumi Mizutani
flavor_text: It grills berries and bug Pokémon with electric shocks and makes a meal of them. It usually nests in the holes gouged in trees by Pikipek.

abilities.name: Nuzzly Gathering
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Pokémon that has the Nuzzle attack, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
